Node.Text: Good afternoon, Mr. Devlin. Second floor, please.
Same to you. Do you know what's happening outside?
Yeah, didn't you hear about Charles? He died last night. The police say it's from a snake bite.
I know, it's terrible. Has anyone said anything about how a snake got in?
No, not really, but it is strange, isn't it? Snakes aren't even native to this part of town, and harder to find is the kind of poison that killed the victims.
I also don't know why he was tending to the flowerbeds at night when most of them are dead from the cold... I also heard that Virginia has been giving flowers to Caroline.
That woman, Virginia, has issues on top of issues, but don't we all?
Anyway, I've got to get going. I'll see you around, Steve.
